contentList.content: Bonuses you receive to your Unarmed Damage also apply to damage you deal with your Disciple of the Elements spells.
Counts as an attack for the purposes of triggering <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">Extra Attack</LSTag>.
Strike twice in quick succession and possibly knock the target <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Strike twice in quick succession and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="OPEN_HAND_NO_REACTIONS">Stagger</LSTag> the target, making it unable to take reactions.
Strike twice in quick succession and possibly push the target [1] away.
